jobDescription: Data Analyst  A large company in the Muskegon, Michigan area is seeking a Data Analyst for a temporary opportunity. As the Data Analyst you will be responsible for analysis of production data through various production reports and compile production data into Microsoft Excel and Access databases, plus provide reports to the leadership team. The successful Data Analyst will turn data into information, information into insight and insight into business decisions. For immediate consideration email your resume to Ariane.Bishop@accountemps.com or call 616-454-5200 today! Responsibilities: Interpret data, analyze results using statistical techniques and provide ongoing reports  Develop and implement databases, data collection systems, data analytics and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality  Acquire data from primary or secondary data sources and maintain databases/data systems  Identify, analyze, and interpret trends or patterns in complex data sets  Filter and "clean" data by reviewing computer reports, printouts, and performance indicators to locate and correct code problems  Work with management to prioritize business and information needs  Locate and define new process improvement opportunities
